starter.banner_subtitle: Create your project from scratch with main components and basic styles.

slides.item1_desc: We bring freshness and shine to your home and office with professional, eco-friendly cleaning solutions
slides.item2_desc: Our trained and insured cleaning professionals ensure high-quality service with attention to detail
slides.item3_desc: From deep cleaning to routine maintenance, we offer flexible services that fit your schedule and budget

features.item1_desc: Use of non-toxic, biodegradable cleaning products for a safe and healthy environment
features.item2_desc: Flexible cleaning plans tailored to your needs
features.item3_desc: Professional, background-checked cleaners ensuring high-quality service
features.item5_desc: Fast response and effective cleaning solutions
features.item6_desc: Use of advanced tools and technology

item1.Includes: Dusting, vacuuming, mopping, bathroom & kitchen cleaning

item2.Includes: Everything in Basic + oven, fridge, window frames, stain removal

item3.Includes: Desk disinfection, floors & carpets, waste disposal

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: See what our satisfied customers have to say about our cleaning services. We take pride in delivering top-quality, reliable, and eco-friendly cleaning solutions. Your satisfaction is our priority!

item1.Name: Jan de Vries
item1.Review: The team did an amazing job! My house has never been this clean. Highly recommend!

item2.Name: Lisa van den Berg
item2.Review: The cleaners were professional, friendly, and very thorough. I’m impressed!

item3.Name: Thomas Bakker
item3.Review: They always arrive on time and leave our office spotless. Great service!

item4.Name: Sanne Jansen
item4.Review: I love that they use eco-friendly products. Safe for my kids and pets!

item5.Name: Daan Meijer
item5.Review: They pay attention to the smallest details. My home looks brand new!

item6.Name: Eva van Dijk
item6.Review: Booking was easy, and the service was outstanding. Will hire again!
